properties.description: This is to copy blob file to database
This is to copy blob file to database
Created for Azure demo 1 as Source conetion
whenever i place my source file in Directory the pipeline has to trigger automatically yes

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mymoviescsvsrc
mymoviescsvsrc filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> FLTmymoviesdb
FLTmymoviesdb aggregate(Avgcomedyrating = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AGGMYMOVIESDB
AGGMYMOVIESDB sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['avgratingofcomedymovies'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MYMOVIESRATING

source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCsalesff
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCsalescategoryff
SRCsalesff, SRCsalescategoryff join(SRCsalesff@ProductCategoryID == SRCsalescategoryff@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JOINSALESCATEGORY
JOINSALESCATEGORY sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Joineroutputofsalesandcateg'],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = SRCsalesff@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID = SRCsalesff@ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryID = SRCsalescategoryff@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		Name = SRCsalescategoryff@Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TGTJOINSALESANDCAT

activities.name: Orchestration_pipeline
activities.description: This flow is to orchestrate the data
